clfLdaFwd

PURPOSE

Apply the Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) classifier to data X.

SYNOPSIS

function Y = clfLdaFwd( clf, X )

DESCRIPTION 

 Apply the Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) classifier to data X.

 USAGE
  Y = clfLdaFwd( clf, X )

 INPUTS
  clf     - trained model
  X       - nxp data array

 OUTPUTS
  Y       - nx1 vector of labels predicted according to the model

 EXAMPLE

 See also CLFLDA, CLFLDATRAIN

0023 if( ~strcmp(clf.type,'lda')); error( ['incorrect type: ' clf.type] ); end
0024 if( size(X,2)~= clf.p ); error( 'Incorrect data dimension' ); end

0026 %%% get clf settings
0027 type = clf.clfLdaType;
0028 prior = clf.prior;
0029 gmeans = clf.gmeans;
0030 gtype = clf.gtype;
0031 groups = clf.groups;
0032 ngroups = clf.ngroups;

0034 %%% calculate D matrix
0035 n = size(X,1);  D = repmat(NaN, n, ngroups);
0036 switch type
0037   case 1 % 'linear'
0038     % MVN relative log posterior density, by group, for each X
0039     R = clf.R;
0040     for k = 1:ngroups
0041       A = (X - repmat(gmeans(k,:), n, 1)) / R;
0042       D(:,k) = log(prior(k)) - .5*sum(A .* A, 2);
0043     end
0044   case {2,3} % 'quadratic' or 'mahalanobis'
0045     for k = 1:ngroups
0046       R=clf.RS{k};
0047       A = (X - repmat(gmeans(k,:), n, 1)) / R;
0048       switch type
0049         case 2 % 'quadratic'
0050           % MVN relative log posterior density, by group, for each X
0051           D(:,k) = log(prior(k)) -.5*(sum(A .* A, 2)+log(prod(diag(R))^2));
0052         case 3 % 'mahalanobis'
0053           % Negative squared Mahalanobis distance, by group, for each
0054           % X.  Prior probabilities are not used
0055           D(:,k) = -sum(A .* A, 2);
0056       end
0057     end
0058 end
0059 
0060 %%% find nearest group to each observation in X data
0061 [tmp Y] = max(D, [], 2);
0062 
0063 %%% Convert back to original grouping variable
0064 if isnumeric(gtype)
